column4: - ljsoftnet, i install ndiswrapper to install windows driver but nothing changed and my wlan is wep key
my wireless network connection stops randomly or after i reboot the system is there any idea about this problem
my wireless network connection stops randomly or after i reboot the system is there any idea about this problem
what kind of computer you have
do you know what wifi card you have in it?
what ver of linux you running
i thought as you but i think its about driver how can i change driver settings
? that is really weird? I know there was a problem with mixed mode when used with g/n but that was fixed
maybe you have compiled some drivers once before and they are still left. If that is the case you need to black list them
thanks for your advices i want to add that when i reboot with windows 7 it turns normal and what should i add to blacklist
you need to make sure that only the mac(kernel) driver is activated. There is a black list that you can add the other diver that wants to take over
you will find the blacklist here /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist
